00223 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00225 #define PARAM_I2Sx(n)   (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_I2S))
00226 
00227 #define PRAM_I2S_FREQ(freq)             ((freq>=16000)&&(freq <= 96000))
00228 /* Macro check I2S word width type */
00229 #define PARAM_I2S_WORDWIDTH(n)  ((n==I2S_WORDWIDTH_8)||(n==I2S_WORDWIDTH_16)\
00230 ||(n==I2S_WORDWIDTH_32))
00231 /* Macro check I2S channel type */
00232 #define PARAM_I2S_CHANNEL(n)    ((n==I2S_STEREO)||(n==I2S_MONO))
00233 /* Macro check I2S master/slave mode */
00234 #define PARAM_I2S_WS_SEL(n)             ((n==I2S_MASTER_MODE)||(n==I2S_SLAVE_MODE))
00235 /* Macro check I2S stop mode */
00236 #define PARAM_I2S_STOP(n)       ((n==I2S_STOP_ENABLE)||(n==I2S_STOP_DISABLE))
00237 /* Macro check I2S reset mode */
00238 #define PARAM_I2S_RESET(n)      ((n==I2S_RESET_ENABLE)||(n==I2S_RESET_DISABLE))
00239 /* Macro check I2S reset mode */
00240 #define PARAM_I2S_MUTE(n)       ((n==I2S_MUTE_ENABLE)||(n==I2S_MUTE_DISABLE))
00241 /* Macro check I2S transmit/receive mode */
00242 #define PARAM_I2S_TRX(n)                ((n==I2S_TX_MODE)||(n==I2S_RX_MODE))
00243 /* Macro check I2S clock select mode */
00244 #define PARAM_I2S_CLKSEL(n)             ((n==I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK)||(n==I2S_CLKSEL_MCLK))
00245 /* Macro check I2S 4-pin mode */
00246 #define PARAM_I2S_4PIN(n)       ((n==I2S_4PIN_ENABLE)||(n==I2S_4PIN_DISABLE))
00247 /* Macro check I2S MCLK mode */
00248 #define PARAM_I2S_MCLK(n)       ((n==I2S_MCLK_ENABLE)||(n==I2S_MCLK_DISABLE))
00249 /* Macro check I2S DMA mode */
00250 #define PARAM_I2S_DMA(n)                ((n==I2S_DMA_1)||(n==I2S_DMA_2))
00251 /* Macro check I2S DMA depth value */
00252 #define PARAM_I2S_DMA_DEPTH(n)  (n<=31)
00253 /* Macro check I2S irq level value */
00254 #define PARAM_I2S_IRQ_LEVEL(n)  (n<=31)
00255 /* Macro check I2S half-period value */
00256 #define PARAM_I2S_HALFPERIOD(n) (n<512)
00257 /* Macro check I2S bit-rate value */
00258 #define PARAM_I2S_BITRATE(n)    (n<=63)

00273 typedef struct {
00274         uint8_t wordwidth;              
00278         uint8_t mono;                   
00281         uint8_t stop;                   
00284         uint8_t reset;

00294 } I2S_CFG_Type;
